push up tip 1: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
push up tip 2: Position hands slightly wider than shoulder-width
push up tip 3: Lower until your chest nearly touches the ground
squat tip 1: Keep weight in your heels and mid-foot
squat tip 2: Keep knees in line with toes, not caving inward
squat tip 3: Maintain a neutral spine position throughout
sit up tip 1: Keep your feet flat on the ground
sit up tip 2: Cross arms over chest or place hands lightly behind ears
sit up tip 3: Engage your core throughout the movement
pull up tip 1: Grip the bar with hands wider than shoulder-width
pull up tip 2: Pull your chest to the bar, not just your chin
pull up tip 3: Engage your back muscles and maintain straight body position
walking tip 1: Keep your head up and shoulders back
walking tip 2: Let your arms swing naturally at your sides
walking tip 3: Maintain a consistent stride length and cadence
